item.description:
Join us for adult only roller skaing! 2 hours on the rink with some fun music.


When: Sunday, May 23rd, 7:00pm - 9:00pm

Cost: Admission is $7. Bring your own skates or rentals are available for an additional $3.

Where:

Carousel Family Fun Center
1055 Auburn St
Whitman, MA 02382
781 857 1286

Who: anyone over the age of 18 is welcome

Min/Max: 4 people minimum signed up by event deadline or event may be cancelled. No max. Guests welcome.

SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.


Organizers: Julie

Please update your RSVP by noon on Sunday the 23rd.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Adult Roller Skating
